answers.answer: I think the first thing a doctor would do is rule out diabetes.  You can go buy a test kit at Walmart for 10 bucks and find out your blood sugar.  Anxiety attacks can also cause these sensations.

question: Hi,Can anyone please tell me if you've experienced this or know what it may be a symptom of? I have dull tingling and pain in both hands and both feet. No other symptoms. It doesn't really hurt, it's just noticeable and not normal. It has been about a week now. Please... any replies would be appreciated. I'm getting kinda scared, but trying to remain positive. thanks
title: pain and tingling, in both hands, both feet
